This ocean-themed resort features a large casino, water park, marine habitat, and luxury accommodations.

Frequently Asked Questions

Everything you need to know about our casino resorts

VIP members enjoy numerous exclusive benefits including priority reservations, room upgrades, personal concierge service, access to private gaming areas, invitations to special events, complimentary amenities, and personalized offers tailored to your preferences.

Reservations can be made directly through each resort's official website, by phone, or through our VIP concierge service if you're a club member. We recommend booking at least 3-6 months in advance for peak seasons and special events to ensure availability.

Yes, age restrictions vary by country. In the United States, guests must be 21 or older to enter gaming areas. In most European and Asian countries, the minimum age is 18. Some resorts offer family-friendly areas and activities for guests of all ages outside the casino floor.

Our featured casino resorts offer a comprehensive selection of games including slots, video poker, blackjack, roulette, craps, baccarat, poker (including Texas Hold'em, Omaha, and other variants), Sic Bo, and various regional specialties. Many also feature high-limit rooms for serious players and private gaming salons for VIP guests.

All of our featured resorts offer extensive non-gambling amenities including world-class restaurants, shopping, entertainment shows, nightclubs, pools, spas, fitness centers, and various recreational activities. Many also organize cultural tours, golf outings, and other excursions to help guests explore the destination.
